articles.title: U.S. policy of interference toward Korea under fire
Foreign diplomats visit metro museum
articles.content:
Foreign diplomats visit metro museum
    Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Diplomats in charge of cultural and friendly relations of different embassies here visited the museum on the construction of metro on Dec. 17 on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army.
 Being briefed on the Pyongyang Metro built as a grand monumental edifice of the era, they went round the relics and data on display at the museum.
